title: 1 rp off...
body: If there is a way that I could get 1 rp to buy gangplank That would be great.

replies.body: Maybe we can help you get that booty!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  I can't make guarantees, but maybe we can work something out!
I did but they riot support said that there were a lot of tickets submitted and that it may take awhile for a response so I'm just waiting at this point.
